mapper.select: select count(*) from project where p_name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

select * from ( select rownum rnum, S.* from ( select (select sum(paym_amount) from payment where p_no = p.p_no) funded_money , i.i_money , (select round( ( (select sum(paym_amount) from payment where p_no = p.p_no ) / i.i_money ) * 100, 2 ) from dual) funded_percent , i.i_stored_name, i.i_category, i.i_end_date, p.* from project p, information i where p.p_name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' and p.p_no = i.p_no(+) order by p.p_no desc ) S ) R where rnum between #{paging.startNo} and #{paging.endNo}

SELECT count(*) FROM ( SELECT ( SELECT round( sum(paym_amount) / i_money * 100, 2 ) FROM payment WHERE p_no = p.p_no ) rate , ( SELECT sum(paym_amount) FROM payment WHERE p_no = p.p_no) sum_amount , p.p_no, p.m_no, p_name , i_category, i_money, i_start_date, i_end_date FROM project P, information I WHERE p.p_no = i.p_no ) PI
AND p_name like '%' || #{sf.keyword} || '%'
OR i_start_date > sysdate
OR sysdate BETWEEN i_start_date AND i_end_date
OR i_end_date < sysdate
AND i_category in ( ${sf.category} )
AND rate BETWEEN #{sf.s1min} AND #{sf.s1max}
AND sum_amount BETWEEN #{sf.s2min} AND #{sf.s2max}
